channel.title: Comments on: Making good progress with IM on E90

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Progress (not significant, though): I've managed to be able to shutdown the IM instance on my phone, so that I don't have to reboot it to kill the application.
Sound not that impressive, but pretty important to improve my development performance. :D
item.content:encoded:
Progress (not significant, though): I’ve managed to be able to shutdown the IM instance on my phone, so that I don’t have to reboot it to kill the application.
